targets.query:
StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Net_Available == true
| summarize sum(State_Net_Available) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Unplanned_Down == true
| summarize sum(State_Unplanned_Down) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where Schedule_Is_Productive == 1
| summarize sum(Schedule_Is_Productive) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Breakdown == true
| summarize sum(State_Breakdown) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize count() by bin(Timestamp, 1m), State_Breakdown
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Breakdown == true
| summarize sum(State_Breakdown) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Breakdown == true
| summarize count() by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Stopped == true
| summarize sum(State_Stopped) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Breakdown == true
| summarize sum(State_Breakdown) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where State_Cycling == true
| summarize sum(State_Cycling) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval)
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Event_Code
| order by Timestamp asc

StateCode
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Event_Desc
| order by Timestamp asc
